metadata.title: CVE-2012-3391 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
mod/forum/rsslib.php in Moodle 2.1.x before 2.1.7 and 2.2.x before 2.2.4does not properly implement the requirement for posting before reading aQ&A forum, which allows remote authenticated users to bypass intendedaccess restrictions by leveraging the student role and reading the RSS feedfor a forum.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3391` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
